ai-atk-s0402a56:2_1: In the fifth enemy of a bad person, that fool is vacant of ignorance, that person is blind and deceitful.
ai-atk-s0402a56:2_2: Destroys a bad person and a bad person.
ai-atk-s0402a56:2_3: the same way as stated under the two kinds of stated.
ai-atk-s0402a56:2_5: as in the other five ways,
ai-atk-s0402a56:2_6: By these five sections consisting in the first two, that is to say, the second, the third, and the fourth, as regardless of the fivefold reckoning, and as the fifth, it is due to subsequently, and in the sixth and eighth in the fivefold reckoning of the heart.
ai-atk-s0402a56:4_1: In the seventh wicked deeds they will receive (any) amount of million,
ai-atk-s0402a56:4_2: Delighting in good friendship, a fine person (only) appears.
ai-atk-s0402a56:4_5: In the ninth (discourse in) the nine things.
ai-atk-s0402a56:4_6: They blameless things and have a good character.
ai-atk-s0402a56:4_9: in this ten respects the Teachers is void of the Vihāras.
ai-atk-s0402a56:5_0: The first sub-chapter on good people is finished.
